game_description: Blobby VR is a casual arcade style and competitive multiplayer game for the oculus quest. Experience the thrilling joy of a volleyball match in VR as a blob playing against another human or an Artificial Intelligence player. Practice in single player mode or play against your friends using Local Area Network or the Cloud. The game is created in the most accessible way, so starting your career is extremely easy. In Blobby VR, you are a blob in a virtual beach scenario. A game lasts 90 seconds. Within this time, you have to use your head to bounce the ball back to the opponent - no hands involved. Practice tricky moves like smash balls or fool the other player with close hits. Once you've tried, you will immediately become addicted to this fast and fun to play game.
